title: Pop WatchFace
summary: A Pop and Geek Watch Face for your smartwatch 16 million colors available
developerAddress: Mr Virlouvet Xavier 68 Avenue de la LibÃ©ration Appartement 101 72000 Le Mans
description: A Pop and Geek screen (WatchFace or Watch Face) for your SmartWatchYou have for outer cercle the hours.For the middle cercle the minutes.For the inner cercle the secondes.The date and current hours are print at the middle of the screen.There is also a good battery management to improve the battery life of your SmartWatch.With this WatchFace you have the date and hours, and you can make it unique. Customise your WatchFace with the Android Wear application on your smartphone.Color is available is level of Red, Green, Bleu ( => More than 16 Millions Color)I still developing this WatchFace so ask me if you need a new fonctionnality.Thanx You
descriptionHTML:
A Pop and Geek screen (WatchFace or Watch Face) for your SmartWatch
You have for outer cercle the hours.
For the middle cercle the minutes.
For the inner cercle the secondes.
The date and current hours are print at the middle of the screen.

There is also a good battery management to improve the battery life of your SmartWatch.

With this WatchFace you have the date and hours, and you can make it unique. Customise your WatchFace with the Android Wear application on your smartphone.


Color is available is level of Red, Green, Bleu ( => More than 16 Millions Color)

I still developing this WatchFace so ask me if you need a new fonctionnality.


Thanx You
